text: Neusticurus rudis, the red neusticurus, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is found in Guyana and Venezuela. ==References== Category:Neusticurus Category:Reptiles of Guyana Category:Reptiles of Venezuela Category:Reptiles described in 1900 Category:Taxa named by George Albert Boulenger
title: Neusticurus rudis
